kickstart.post:
AIRBOSS=`/bin/cat /proc/cmdline | /bin/awk \ 'BEGIN {RS="[[:space:]]"; FS="="} /airboss/{print $2}'`
if [ "$AIRBOSS" != "" ] then /opt/stack/bin/stack add host attr localhost airboss $AIRBOSS fi

/opt/stack/bin/stack set host attr localhost roll_install_on_the_fly true \ shadow=yes
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr user.auth unix
